titles.title: A resolution designating June 13, 2024, as "National Seersucker Day", designating every Thursday after National Seersucker Day through the last Thursday in August 2024 as "Seersucker Thursday", and designating June 2024 as "Seersucker Appreciation Month".

A resolution designating June 13, 2024, as "National Seersucker Day", designating every Thursday after National Seersucker Day through the last Thursday in August 2024 as "Seersucker Thursday", and designating June 2024 as "Seersucker Appreciation Month".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
This resolution designates June 13, 2024, as National Seersucker Day.
The resolution designates every Thursday after National Seersucker Day through the last Thursday in August 2024 as Seersucker Thursday.
The resolution designates June 2024 as Seersucker Appreciation Month.
